title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for June 12
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for June 12
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Yelena Shulyatyeva Senior U.S. Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Tech stocks bring reversal of fortune for S&P 500 growth." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
